TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DocumentsContract/Root extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: Constants related to a root of documents, including Cursor column names and flags.

remarks.para: Constants related to a root of documents, including Cursor column names and flags. A root is the start of a tree of documents, such as a physical storage device, or an account. Each root starts at the directory referenced by Root#COLUMN_DOCUMENT_ID, which can recursively contain both documents and directories.
All columns are read-only to client applications.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Number of bytes available in this root.

remarks.para: Number of bytes available in this root. This column is optional, and may be null if unknown or unbounded.
Type: INTEGER (long)
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Capacity of a root in bytes.

remarks.para: Capacity of a root in bytes. This column is optional, and may be null if unknown or unbounded.
Type: INTEGER (long)
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Document which is a directory that represents the top directory of this root.

remarks.para: Document which is a directory that represents the top directory of this root. This column is required.
Type: STRING
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Flags that apply to a root.

remarks.para: Flags that apply to a root. This column is required.
Type: INTEGER (int)
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Icon resource ID for a root.

remarks.para: Icon resource ID for a root. This column is required.
Type: INTEGER (int)
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: MIME types supported by this root.

remarks.para: MIME types supported by this root. This column is optional, and if null the root is assumed to support all MIME types. Multiple MIME types can be separated by a newline. For example, a root supporting audio might return "audio/*\napplication/x-flac".
Type: STRING
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Query arguments supported by this root.

remarks.para: Query arguments supported by this root. This column is optional and related to #COLUMN_FLAGS and #FLAG_SUPPORTS_SEARCH. If the flags include #FLAG_SUPPORTS_SEARCH, and the column is null, the root is assumed to support #QUERY_ARG_DISPLAY_NAME search of Document#COLUMN_DISPLAY_NAME. Multiple query arguments can be separated by a newline. For example, a root supporting #QUERY_ARG_MIME_TYPES and #QUERY_ARG_DISPLAY_NAME might return "android:query-arg-mime-types\nandroid:query-arg-display-name".
Type: STRING
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Unique ID of a root.

remarks.para: Unique ID of a root. This ID is both provided by and interpreted by a DocumentsProvider, and should be treated as an opaque value by client applications. This column is required.
Type: STRING
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Summary for this root, which may be shown to a user.

remarks.para: Summary for this root, which may be shown to a user. This column is optional, and may be null. For a single storage service surfacing multiple accounts as different roots, this summary should be the name of the account.
Type: STRING
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Title for a root, which will be shown to a user.

remarks.para: Title for a root, which will be shown to a user. This column is required. For a single storage service surfacing multiple accounts as different roots, this title should be the name of the service.
Type: STRING
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Provider.DocumentRootFlags FlagEmpty = (64)

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Provider.DocumentRootFlags enum directly instead of this field.", true)]
[<System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Provider.DocumentRootFlags enum directly instead of this field.", true)>]

Docs.summary: Flag indicating that this root is currently empty.

remarks.para: Flag indicating that this root is currently empty. This may be used to hide the root when opening documents, but the root will still be shown when creating documents and #FLAG_SUPPORTS_CREATE is also set. If the value of this flag changes, such as when a root becomes non-empty, you must send a content changed notification for DocumentsContract#buildRootsUri(String).
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

[<System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Provider.DocumentRootFlags enum directly instead of this field.", true)>]

Docs.summary: Flag indicating that this root offers content that is strictly local on the device.

remarks.para: Flag indicating that this root offers content that is strictly local on the device. That is, no network requests are made for the content.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Flag indicating that at least one directory under this root supports creating content.

remarks.para: Flag indicating that at least one directory under this root supports creating content. Roots with this flag will be shown when an application interacts with Intent#ACTION_CREATE_DOCUMENT.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
